item.title: Moving your Jekyll site from GitHub Pages to GitLab
item.description: For the last several months, I’ve been pondering the move of this site from GitHub Pages to GitLab. I have several reasons which I won’t get into here, but the recent news regarding the acquisition of GitHub by Microsoft gave me the impetus to get this done. I ran into several interesting “hiccups” during the process, and decided to write this post to help anyone else going down this road.
